system.description: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures within 60 feet of a symbol of stunning instead become stunned for 1d6 rounds. A rogue can use Search (DC 32) to find it and Disable Device (DC 32) to thwart it.

components.materialDescription: Mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal with a total value of at least 5,000 gp.

system.target: One symbol drawn on a surface
